price: Tàbí ẹ lérò pé A óò fi yín sílẹ̀ láì jẹ́ pé Allāhu ti ṣàfi hàn àwọn tó máa jagun ẹ̀sìn nínú yín, tí wọn kò sì ní ọ̀rẹ́ àyò kan lẹ́yìn Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ àti àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo? Allāhu ni Alámọ̀tán nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتُمۡ أَن تُتۡرَكُواْ وَلَمَّا يَعۡلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَلَمۡ يَتَّخِذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلِيجَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'tum an tut'rakū walammā yaʿlami al-lahu alladhīna jāhadū minkum walam yattakhidhū min dūni al-lahi walā rasūlihi walā al-mu'minīna walījatan wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
